title: How many words per minute does the average adult read? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is an unanswerable question. Reading speed depends on what one is reading: for instance, I can read a novel at a moderate pace, but a textbook requires me to read quite slowly. Some readers, myself included, like to reread and reread particularly well-made sentences, a pleasure that slows us down. Average WPM is a very slippery concept; reading pace is a continuous variable. Concentrate on enjoyment and knowledge, not speed. Best wishes.
Medium - a blogging website which displays average reading time for its articles estimates it at around 265wpm in most languages. Read time
